The Jiexiu Delong Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Shanxi Province, China, with a production capacity of 90,000 tons per year

operators: 山西介休鑫峪沟德隆煤业有限公司

web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Jiexiu Delong Coal Industry Co., Ltd., which is owned by Shanxi Luxin Energy Group Co., Ltd.
